duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyze and execute assigned programs and projects related to medical and surgical supply chain workflow processes.
Review and analyze departmental data, processes, and activities to develop recommendations for improving business workflows.
Document results and requirements, working within predefined scope and objectives to meet overall business strategies.
Handle multiple projects or initiatives simultaneously and provide project outcomes and objectives within scope and quality timeframe.
Participate in outstanding customer service and maintain respectful relationships with stakeholders.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Supply Chain Management or related field (Master's preferred)
